text: The Mayor is authorized to promulgate such rules and regulations as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this subchapter.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Mayor to make rules and regulations.
